title: Advanced English 508
headline: This free online English course covers prefixes and suffixes and explains how to use indirect speech.
description: This English course teaches you how to add common English prefixes and suffixes to a wide range of root words to form new ones. We then discuss the grammatical rules surrounding indirect speech. We show you how to use various forms of reporting verbs in the present and past tenses to ask questions. This course suits those with a basic grasp of English who want to improve their language skills and confidence in this global tongue.
courseDescription:
This course provides grammar skills and helpful vocabulary to enhance your command of the English language. It begins with an overview of different types of prefixes and suffixes and demonstrates how they transform the meaning of single words. We then present you with articles, videos, and audio clips to help you practice your growing English abilities.

The course then explores indirect speech. We first review the previously covered forms of indirect speech in the present and past tenses and questions. We then explain how to use indirect questions in the perfect continuous form. We illustrate using reporting verbs in indirect speech to form various formulas, passive sentences, and exclamations.

We have designed this course to help you to improve your English reading, speaking, and writing skills. Adding common English prefixes and suffixes to root words will boost your confidence and communication ability. There are exercises found in our ‘Resources’ section that you can download to try out your newfound knowledge and skills immediately. Language proficiency can open personal and professional doors for you, so sign up for these English lessons to master prefixes, suffixes, and indirect speech.
